title: At the Court at Whitehall April the twenty first, 1680 present the Kings Most Excellent Majesty ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed for John Bill, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills,
notes: An order offering a reward for the discovery of the assaulters of John Arnold.
